official.headline: Halden's Message Aired
official.anchor_line: Marek Halden's personal address is broadcast citywide, encouraging unity and self-reflection.
official.contextual_reframing: The Council demonstrates transparency, guiding Stenograd through balanced disclosure and civic resilience.

official.headline: Citizens Gather, Debate
official.anchor_line: Public assemblies form across Stenograd as residents discuss Halden's message in calm, supervised venues.
official.contextual_reframing: Open forums allow the population to process and participate, reinforcing the stability of collective governance.

official.headline: Future Path Unveiled
official.anchor_line: A citywide forum is convened, inviting residents to help shape Stenograd's next chapter with the Council.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic adaptability prevails as Stenograd moves forward with renewed unity and controlled optimism.

underground.headline: Council Shakes, Truth Leaks
underground.anchor_line: Halden's confession hit every screen - no more secrets, only shock.
underground.contextual_reframing: The system built to watch us just slipped on its own blind spot. Even the master couldn't live by his rules.

underground.headline: Crowds Talk, Hope Fights Fear
underground.anchor_line: People flood the streets and halls, demanding answers - finally, nobody is silent.
underground.contextual_reframing: Real voices rise as supervised 'debates' can't contain anger, grief, and the urge for something new.

underground.headline: City Faces Itself at Last
underground.anchor_line: Halden's last words force Stenograd to look in the mirror. The future is suddenly open - and terrifyingly real.
underground.contextual_reframing: Now we see the machine. Now we decide if we stay cogs or build something human together.
